column8:
As sports men go Cavendish, the first cyclist to win the BBC Sports Personality of The Year, might be said to be the epitome of “what is uttered from the heart alone will win the hearts of others to your own” a key part of the brief to our designers. 


And apart from quality mumble: racing plans A, B or C – who cares, Cavendish apparently has a strategy for them all. 


For Cavendish's army of supporters yesterday's stage (2) of the tour must have been just about the most exciting sprint they have seen him consummate.  I think it was plan C...


Our t shirt declares him as the winner of the Green Sprinters Jersey for the 2012 Tour de France.  If he does not win it we will correct things for no charge, we will even pay for the return postage.


The t shirt shows a sprinter who is sure he has won but not yet over the line – his arms are still on the way up, the line not yet crossed... 


The line on the shirt Cavendish is about to cross could be any one of a few stages in this year's tour or indeed the Olympic Road Race to come.


Take a chance, support Cavendish, wear our Cavendish for the Green Jesrsey and Olympic Road Race t shirt.
